810:4: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 1||
810:5: hṛṣṭo hūkāravajraḥ paśupatidamako vajraghaṇṭā ca hṛṣṭā
810:8: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 2 ||
810:12: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 3 ||
810:15: māyūrī māmakī ca kṣapitaripugaṇā pāṇḍarā rocanādyā-
810:16: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 4 ||
810:19: keyūrī jñānasārā dhvajanihitakarā ṣaṭkarā śābarī ca
810:20: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 5 ||
810:21: vaiṇyā mālyā sugītā prathitajinavare śābarī dhūpavajrā
810:24: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 6 ||
810:28: tuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 7 ||
810:29: chatraṃ dūrvā ca padmaṃ dhvajamapi nihitaṃ lo(ro)
810:33: stuṣṭāḥ sarvārthasiddhiṃ dadatu samarasā maṅgalaṃ bodhisattvāḥ || 8 ||
